Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Trump Account hacks article, new blog entries, FAQ pages, and i18n support

New content: Trump Account optimization strategies \("hacks"\) article covering
Roth conversion ladder, free money stacking, front-loading, investment
optimization, and common pitfalls. Also includes several new blog articles,
FAQ hub pages, and Spanish \(es\) internationalization pages.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix eligibility checker stale state bug causing false "Not Eligible" results

Pass SSN answer directly to checkEligibility\(\) instead of reading from
React state, which hasn''t updated yet in the same event handler. Also
fix MiniEligibilityChecker type coercion for birth year.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
